schemas.name: alert
schemas.title: Alert
schemas.description: Alert component for displaying messages with severity levels

dismissible.description: Show close button to dismiss alert

schemas.name: article
schemas.title: Article Component
schemas.description: Semantic article component for blog posts, news, and documentation pages.

schemas.name: articles
schemas.title: Articles List Component
schemas.description: A wrapper component to display a list or grid of articles.

layout.description: Layout mode: grid, list, or masonry

columns.description: Number of columns for grid layout

limit.description: Maximum number of articles to show

source.description: Data source URL for fetching articles dynamically

schemas.name: audio
schemas.title: Audio
schemas.description: Audio player with optional 15-band graphic equalizer

schemas.name: avatar
schemas.title: Avatar
schemas.description: User avatar with image, initials fallback, and status indicator

name.description: Full name (generates initials if not provided)

schemas.name: badge
schemas.title: Badge
schemas.description: Small label/tag for status indicators, counts, or categories

pill.description: Pill shape with full border radius

schemas.name: builder
schemas.title: Builder Schema
schemas.description: Unified schema for builder components and UI interactions.

components.description: List of components in the builder.

id.description: Unique component ID. Auto-generated as readable camelCase with counter (e.g., sidebarLeft-1, column2-1, hero-1)

schemas.name: button
schemas.title: Button
schemas.description: Interactive button with variants, sizes, and optional icon

icon.description: Icon name from built-in library, or any emoji/text

schemas.name: cardbutton
schemas.title: Button Card
schemas.description: Card with action buttons in footer

schemas.name: card
schemas.title: Card Component
schemas.description: Base card component. IS-A article, HAS-A header, main, footer.

size.description: Card size variant controlling max/min width

schemas.name: cardprofile
schemas.title: Card Profile
schemas.description: Simple profile card. INHERITS from card.base (IS-A card), CONTAINS profile elements (HAS-A avatar, name, role, bio, cover).

schemas.name: checkbox
schemas.title: Checkbox
schemas.description: Checkbox input with label and custom styling

schemas.name: chip
schemas.title: Chip
schemas.description: Small pill-shaped tag/label, optionally dismissible

schemas.name: codecontrol
schemas.title: Code Control
schemas.description: Interactive code editor/viewer control.

schemas.name: collapse
schemas.title: Collapse
schemas.description: Collapsible content area.

schemas.name: confetti
schemas.title: Confetti
schemas.description: Confetti particle animation effect

schemas.name: copy
schemas.title: Copy
schemas.description: Click to copy text to clipboard.

target.description: Selector of element to copy from

schemas.name: darkmode
schemas.title: Dark Mode Toggle
schemas.description: Button to toggle dark/light theme.

schemas.name: demo
schemas.title: Demo Container
schemas.description: A container that renders children normally in a CSS grid and shows the raw HTML as a syntax-highlighted, auto-formatted code sample below. Uses fetch for raw page source, formatHtml for consistent 2-space indentation, and textContent to prevent browser inflation.

columns.description: Number of grid columns for children (1-6)

schemas.name: details
schemas.title: Details
schemas.description: Native HTML5 details disclosure widget with optional animation

schemas.name: dialog
schemas.title: Dialog
schemas.description: Modal dialog using native HTML5 dialog element

schemas.name: draggable
schemas.title: Draggable
schemas.description: Make an element draggable.

schemas.name: carddraggable
schemas.title: Draggable Card
schemas.description: Card that can be dragged around the page

schemas.name: drawer
schemas.title: Drawer
schemas.description: Slide-out panel overlay from screen edge

schemas.name: drawerLayout
schemas.title: Drawer Layout
schemas.description: Collapsible sidebar layout with toggle

schemas.name: dropdown
schemas.title: Dropdown
schemas.description: Toggleable dropdown menu

schemas.name: cardexpandable
schemas.title: Expandable Card
schemas.description: Card with collapsible/expandable content section

schemas.name: cardfile
schemas.title: File Card
schemas.description: File display card with icon, name, size, and download

schemas.name: fireworks
schemas.title: Fireworks
schemas.description: Fireworks particle burst animation effect

schemas.name: fix-card
schemas.title: Fix Card
schemas.description: Component for displaying fix/remediation details.

schemas.name: footer
schemas.title: Footer
schemas.description: Page footer with copyright, links, and social icons

schemas.name: globe
schemas.title: Globe
schemas.description: 3D Globe visualization.

schemas.name: header
schemas.title: Header
schemas.description: Page header with logo, title, and optional navigation

schemas.name: hero
schemas.title: Hero
schemas.description: Hero section behavior.

schemas.name: cardhero
schemas.title: Hero Card
schemas.description: Hero banner with background image, title, subtitle, and optional CTA

pretitle.description: Small label or count shown above the title (e.g. '100 Components')

content.description: HTML content rendered in the hero content area (allows attribute-only usage instead of slots)

overlay.description: Show gradient overlay for text readability

schemas.name: home-page
schemas.title: Home Page
schemas.description: Schema for validating the home page structure, behaviors, and all permutations.

demo.description: Every example/demo block must use wb-demo tag for compliance.

values.title: Component Library
values.description: Over 40 ready-to-use UI components including Cards, Modals, Drawers, and Navigation.

values.title: Behaviors System
values.description: Compose interactions like Lego bricks. Add x-fade-in, x-sticky, or x-validate to any element.

values.title: Theme Engine
values.description: 23 built-in themes with CSS Variable support. Dark mode, Light mode, and Auto detection support out of the box.

values.title: Data Viz
values.description: Built-in charts, stats cards, and audio visualizations powered by Web Standards.

values.title: Accessible
values.description: ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation are baked into every component by default.

values.title: Performance
values.description: Zero-runtime compilation. Browsers are fast now. We let them do their job.

schemas.name: cardhorizontal
schemas.title: Horizontal Card
schemas.description: Card with horizontal layout - image on side, content on other

schemas.name: cardimage
schemas.title: Image Card
schemas.description: Card with featured image and optional title/subtitle

schemas.name: input
schemas.title: Input
schemas.description: Text input field with label, helper text, and validation states

clearable.description: Show clear button when has value

schemas.name: cardlink
schemas.title: Link Card
schemas.description: Clickable card that navigates to a URL

schemas.description: Renders Markdown content as HTML, either from inline content or external source

projects.description: JSON array of {name, description, url, image}

stats.description: JSON array of {label, value} for stats display

schemas.description: Pricing tier card with plan name, price, features list, and CTA

schemas.description: E-commerce product card with image, price, rating, and CTA

centered.description: Center ripple instead of click position

schemas.description: CSS sticky positioning for sidebars that stay visible while scrolling

schemas.description: Falling snowflake animation effect

target.description: Selector for element to track (for spotlight/fixture)

schemas.description: Statistics display card with value, label, icon, and trend indicator

label.description: Label describing what the value represents

schemas.name: sticky
schemas.title: Sticky
schemas.description: Makes element stick to viewport on scroll

schemas.name: switch
schemas.title: Switch
schemas.description: Toggle switch for boolean settings

schemas.name: table
schemas.title: Table
schemas.description: Data table with sorting, filtering, and pagination

columns.description: Column config as JSON [{key, label, sortable}]

schemas.name: behaviors
schemas.title: WB Behaviors Schema
schemas.description: Master schema defining all behavior metadata, properties, interactions, accessibility, and test requirements

description.description: Human-readable description of what the behavior does

selector.description: CSS selector that identifies elements this behavior applies to

dependencies.description: Other behaviors or components this behavior depends on

schemas.title: WB Control
schemas.description: Base control interaction behavior.

schemas.description: Schema for the WB Page Builder pages system including navigation, breadcrumbs, and component management
